param.name: keyword
param.doc: A string to search against events, attractions and venues. The keyword will be checked against titles, descriptions, names and other logical fields that describe any of these data objects.

param.name: postalCode
param.doc: Zipcode or Postal Code of the venue in which the event is taking place.

param.name: latlong
param.doc: The Latitude,Longitude coordinates for the venue in which this event is taking place.

param.name: radius
param.doc: The radius of the area in which we want to search for events.

param.name: unit
param.doc: The radius distance unit. Possible values: miles, km.

param.name: source
param.doc: Source of the event. Possible values are '', 'ticketmaster', 'ticketweb', 'universe'.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The event locale, including country and localization.

param.name: marketId
param.doc: The city/area in which this event takes place.

param.name: startDateTime
param.doc: Include events happening after this date.

param.name: endDateTime
param.doc: Include events happening before this date.

param.name: includeTBA
param.doc: Whether or not to return events with dates to be announced (TBA). Default is 'no', TBA events are not returned.

param.name: includeTBD
param.doc: Whether or not to return events with dates to be announced (TBD). Default is 'no', TBD events are not returned.

param.name: includeTest
param.doc: Whether or not to return test events. Default is 'no', test events are not returned.

param.name: size
param.doc: The number of events returned in the API response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page for paginating through the results.

param.name: onsaleStartDateTime
param.doc: Include events happening before this date.

param.name: onsaleEndDateTime
param.doc: Include events happening before this date.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the 20 most recent events for the authenticating user.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The event locale, including country and localization.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the event detail by event ID.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The event locale, including country and localization.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns all the images for an event by ID. If an event does not have an image for a supported resolution, the event's classification image will be returned instead.

param.name: keyword
param.doc: A string to search against attraction names.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The attraction locale, including country and localization.

param.name: size
param.doc: The number of attractions returned in the API response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page for paginating through the results.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The attraction locale, including country and localization.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the attraction detail by ID.

param.name: keyword
param.doc: A string to search against classifications names.

param.name: classificationID
param.doc: A string to search by classification ID

param.name: size
param.doc: The number of categories returned in the API response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page for paginating through the results.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The attraction locale, including country and localization.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the classification detail by ID.

param.name: keyword
param.doc: A string to search against venue names.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The venue locale, including country and localization.

param.name: size
param.doc: The number of venues returned in the API response.

param.name: page
param.doc: The page for paginating through the results.

param.name: locale
param.doc: The venue locale, including country and localization.

method.name: GET
method.doc: Returns the venue detail by ID.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

apigee:payload.doc: The payload should contain a valid create cart in json format.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

apigee:payload.doc: The payload should contain a valid create cart in json format.

method.name: POST
method.doc:
Publish Events on ticketmaster network! So they became available on ticketmaster websites and can be find using the Discovery API.
The "common.isTest" should be set to "false" so your event get indexed in the Discovery API.

param.name: TMPS-Correlation-Id
param.doc: The TMPS-Correlation-Id header will be propagate to all our system. In order to track down issue with your request. You should provide it and it should be unique for each request.

apigee:payload.doc: The payload should contains a valid Event in json format.
